doc.name: resume

history.changed: Android support added. launchData parameter added

doc.summary: Sent to the current card when the application is brought to the foreground.

parameter.name: launchData
parameter.description: When the app is resumed to handle a request from another app, this will contain the request data in the form of an array (mobile only).

examples.example:
on resume
show stack "Toolbar"
end resume

on resume pLoadData
if pLaunchData is an array then
doLaunchAction pLaunchData
end if
end resume

description.p: Handle the resume message if you want to perform some action when the application is made active.
The resume message is sent whenever the user switches back to the application from another program.
The actual switch is not triggered by the resume message, so trapping the message and not allowing it to pass does not prevent the user from switching into the application.
